basics.name: Nathan Storey
basics.label: Director of Data Governance • Civic Technologist
basics.summary: Civic technologist and data-governance leader in NYC government with a track record of turning policy goals into delivery: open data, standards, and user‑centered digital services. Led the NYC‑GO governance dataset adopted for the Agency Directory on NYC.gov and MetaCat, a citywide metadata/catalog effort aligned to DCAT‑US. Previously built delivery teams and products in homelessness services (HOME‑STAT dashboards; StreetSmart).

work.name: NYC Office of Technology & Innovation (OTI) — Office of Data & Analytics (ODA)
work.summary: Lead citywide data governance initiatives, standards, and open data/catalog modernization.
highlights: Published the NYC Agencies & Governance Organizations (NYC‑GO) dataset powering the Agency Directory on NYC.gov.
Lead MetaCat: defined asset types/fields aligned to DCAT‑US; drafted contribution workflows for citywide adoption.
Co‑steward NYC Open Data policy, quality, and release pipelines; advanced documentation and standards adoption.
Prototyped GitHub‑first docs and the NYC Open Data MCP to accelerate documentation and developer workflows.
Co‑led the Data Asset Working Group (DAWG); authored citywide guidance and strategy artifacts.

work.name: NYC Department of Homeless Services (DHS)
work.position: Executive Director of Data & Analytics; Founding Director, Street Homeless Solutions Lab
work.summary: Built delivery‑oriented analytics/product capacity for street homelessness services.
highlights: Established a product & service design team; secured funding and executive sponsorship.
Implemented policy co‑creation (ORID) across hundreds of stakeholders to standardize practice.
Built the agency’s first unified client list to streamline reporting and enable usage‑pattern research.
Audited reporting and delivered prioritized improvements adopted by DHS leadership.

work.name: NYC Mayor’s Office of Operations
work.summary: Product lead for StreetSmart and public HOME‑STAT dashboards.
highlights: Embedded user‑centered design and a dedicated product manager role into DHS IT for the first time.
Launched public HOME‑STAT dashboards and standardized cross‑provider KPIs with multiple agencies.

work.name: IDNYC (NYC HRA)
highlights: Designed executive reporting for HRA, the Mayor’s Office, and City Council; consolidated indicators across systems.

work.name: Ontodia
highlights: Designed UX for NYCpedia and CivicDashboards; developed geospatial databases from multiple sources.

work.name: ioby
highlights: Built digital storytelling and social strategy; secured a $25,000 grant.

education.institution: NYU Tisch School of the Arts

projects.name: NYC Agencies & Governance Organizations (NYC‑GO) dataset
projects.summary: Standardized governance dataset powering the Agency Directory on NYC.gov.

projects.name: MetaCat
projects.summary: Citywide metadata/catalog initiative aligned to DCAT‑US.

projects.name: StreetSmart
projects.summary: Product for outreach operations with UCD and product management embedded at DHS.

projects.name: HOME‑STAT Dashboards
projects.summary: Public dashboards and standardized KPIs across outreach providers.
